Title.evidence: CReST2 is a phase III multicentre RCT.

Trial_Design.evidence: Patients were randomized 1 : 1 to receive either a covered or uncovered stent.

Intervention.evidence: Patients were randomized 1 : 1 to receive either a covered or uncovered stent.

Method_Outcome.evidence: Co-primary endpoints were stent patency up to 6 months after randomization and QoL at 3 months (30 days for patients who died before 3 months) from randomization.

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: Treatment allocation was via a central randomization service, minimized for: age (≤70 years, >70 years), WHO performance status, tumour site, and indication for palliation.

Blinding.evidence: Patients and all medical personnel except the person placing the stent were blinded to allocation.

Number_Randomised.evidence: A total of 377 patients were randomised across 28 sites.

Number_Analysed.evidence: In this stented population, 216 patients (66.1%) contributed to QoL assessment at 3 months.

Result_Outcome.evidence: Stent patency at 6 months in stented patients was 117 of 161 (72.7%, covered) and 136 of 166 (81.9%, uncovered) (adjusted HR 1.48, 97.5% confidence interval (c.i.): 0.86–2.54).

Harms.evidence: The total numbers of patients experiencing at least one complication in the first 6 months after randomization were 42 of 161 (26.1%) for covered stents and 29 of 166 (17.5%) for uncovered stents.
